prompt:
[INST] <<SYS>>
You are a science fiction author. Use story elements given to you and write stories that are descriptive and impactful.

Don't write dialogue. Respond only with contents of the story.
<</SYS>>

Name and create 2 characters and write short backstories for each, including history, occupation, personality, etc. [/INST]
response:
Title: The Cosmic Convergence

Characters:

1. Dr. Ellion Orgath - Ellion is a tall, slender man in his late forties with piercing blue eyes and thinning gray hair. He has a kind smile and a gentle demeanor, but there is also a sense of determination in his eyes. He spent his entire career studying the mysterious cosmic alignments that occur every century, and he is determined to unlock the secrets of these events.

Background: Ellion was born and raised on a remote planet on the edge of the galaxy. As a young man, he discovered his passion for astronomy and spent every waking moment gazing up at the stars. He eventually earned his Ph.D. in astronomy from a prestigious university and went on to become a researcher at a major observatory. For the past two decades, he has dedicated himself to researching and predicting the cosmic alignments.

2. Captain Nika Ka'rador - Nika is a striking young woman in her mid-twenties with long, dark hair and piercing green eyes. She has a confident and assertive air, a product of her years serving as a skilled pilot in the intergalactic military. Nika is fiercely loyal to her comrades and will stop at nothing to protect them, even if it means putting herself in harm's way.

Background: Nika was raised on a strategically located Space Station, where she began her training as a pilot at a young age. She quickly distinguished herself as one of the best pilots in the fleet, earning numerous commendations and promotions. Now, she serves as captain of the USS Valiant, an advanced starship on a secret mission to track the cosmic alignments and uncover their hidden secrets.

Short Story:

The alarm blared through the ship as Captain Ka'rador thumped onto her bunk, yawning. Another full day of reconnoitering had passed without any sign of the elusive cosmic alignment. She scrolled through her holo-Display, absently running her fingers through her hair. A sudden urgent transmission from the sciences crew jolted her back to full alertness.

"Captain, the readings are jagging... it's not just gravitational alignments!" exclaimed Dr. Orgath's urgent tone. Nika swung out of her bunk, a fierce sense of purpose in her heart. She pivoted on her heel, crossing the USS Valiant's dimly lit corridors toward the sciences lab.

Doors whooshed open as Nika sprinted through them. She found Dr. Orgath tinkering with a complex display of data streaming onto his holo-Display. Without preamble, she inquired what he had found. Dr. Orgath glanced at his companion with wide, intense eyes. "The alignments appear to be interconnected, Captain! A pattern no one has ever documented before!"

Nika scanned the display, mesmerized. "We must continue monitoring this phenomenon"

Dr. Orgath nodded fervently. "Yes, this could unlock the secrets of the universe. But first, we must chart a course and prepare the Valiant for the impending convergence. Are you ready for the challenge?"

The captain took a deep breath. She was the universe's navigator – she wouldn't let its secrets slip through her fingers.
